summary: In a dangerous but human Rio's slum, rises the love affair betwen Orfeu and Eurídice, provoking jealousy and violence in times of carnival.
cast: Toni Garrido|Patrícia França|Murilo Benício|Zezé Motta|Milton Gonçalves|Isabel Fillardis|Maria Ceiça|Stepan Nercessian|Maurício Gonçalves|Lúcio Andrey|Mary Sheila|Eliezer Motta|Serjão Loroza|Silvio Guindane|Castrinho|Alexandre Hendersen|Gustavo Gasparani|Paula Assunção|Patrícia Costa|Andréa Marques|Nelson Sargento|Cássio Gabus Mendes|Ivan de Albuquerque|Léa Garcia|Tulianne Cristina|Luiz Antônio do Nascimento|Aisha Jambo|Yuri Krushewsky|Ed Oliveira|Jackeline Olivier|Diogo Reis|Maria Ribeiro|Caetano Veloso|Orlando Vieira
title: Orfeu
